notes: Catalog entries define terrain TYPES (what a piece is).
Scenario/Map uses terrain_instances.json to place copies.
All entries include the same schema sections (footprint/visibility/cover/elevation/movement/interaction/slots/destructibility) even when minimal.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks partial line of sight if line passes through the entrance face at ground level

interactions.name: Enter the Mine
interactions.on_success: Place this model in Mine Network (scenario-defined) or gain 1 Hidden token.
interactions.on_fail: Cave air: model becomes Pressured until end of round.

slots.label: Mine Mouth
notes: Scenario builder can use as a spawn/exit or objective anchor.

slots.label: Mine Story Anchor
notes: Hooks for events: cave-in, echoes, hidden loot.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

interactions.name: Operate Control Panel
interactions.on_success: Flip/advance scenario state (doors, lights, rails, alarms).
interactions.on_fail: Alarm: nearest enemy gains +1 die vs this model‚Äôs next defense.

breakpoints.effect: Disabled: interactions on this panel are no longer available.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through solid walls; firing slits allow partial LoS out

breakpoints.effect: Cracked cover: edges cover drops from Heavy to Light.
Breach: interior becomes passable; treat as rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS when line crosses the wall segment at equal or lower elevation

test.on_fail: Fall back: remain on original side; take 1 die damage

breakpoints.effect: Breach: becomes passable gap (treat as Difficult rubble crossing).

visibility.blocks_los_when: Main supports block partially; platform provides elevated firing

breakpoints.effect: Shaken supports: climb tests now require Quality 2.
Collapse: platforms become impassable rubble; models on platforms take 2 dice damage.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

slots.label: Trail Story Anchor
notes: Use for patrol routes, tracks, ambush triggers.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Bridge deck does not block LoS; supports can partially block at ground level

breakpoints.effect: Cracked deck: Bridge Deck counts as Difficult terrain.
Collapse: place a 6" rubble hazard beneath; deck becomes impassable gap.

notes: Replace collapse area with Unstable Terrain patch.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Partially blocks LoS across the altar mass

interactions.name: Consecrate / Desecrate
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Ritual point or flip altar control to your faction.
interactions.on_fail: Backlash: take 1 die damage (echo burn / dread).

slots.label: Altar Objective Anchor
notes: Place Artifact or Ritual token here.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

interactions.name: Work the Circle
interactions.on_success: Place/advance Ritual progress (scenario-defined).
interactions.on_fail: Disruption: lose 1 progress or become Pressured.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Partially blocks LoS through broken walls

interactions.name: Risk the Collapse
interactions.on_success: Choose: gain 1 Loot token OR force an enemy within 3" to take 1 die damage (falling debris).
interactions.on_fail: Collapse: this area becomes Unstable Terrain; acting model takes 2 dice damage.

slots.label: Collapse Anchor
notes: Scenario can convert this into an Unstable patch.

breakpoints.effect: Full collapse: replace with Unstable Terrain patch.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

interactions.name: Extract / Evacuate
interactions.on_success: Scenario-defined extraction (remove model/objective).

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

slots.label: Crack Anchor
notes: Hook for 'fall through' or tremor events.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

interactions.name: Throw a Switch
interactions.on_success: Advance rail event (scenario-defined).
interactions.on_fail: Jammed: cannot be used again this round.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

slots.label: Boardwalk Anchor
notes: Great for streetfront scenes and chases.

breakpoints.effect: Broken planks: becomes Difficult terrain.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Tank mass partially blocks LoS; legs do not

test.on_fail: Slip: remain at current level; take 1 die damage

interactions.name: Tap the Tower
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Water token (or scenario resource).
interactions.on_fail: Valve seized: cannot be tapped again this round.

breakpoints.effect: Leaking: ground within 3" counts as Difficult (mud/wet).
Collapse: models on levels 1-2 take 3 dice damage; replace with large rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Partially blocks LoS across the wreck bulk

interactions.name: Search the Wreck
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Loot token.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through rock mass

slots.label: Outcrop Anchor
notes: Good perch or hidden cache spot.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through rock mass

test.on_fail: Slip: take 1 die damage; remain at base

slots.label: High Ground Objective
notes: Place artifact here for dramatic play.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Mesa sides block LoS when line crosses cliff face at equal elevation

test.on_fail: Fall: take 2 dice damage; remain at base

slots.label: Mesa Top Objective
notes: Signature 'fight for the high ground' point.

slots.label: Cliff Edge Anchor
notes: Use for fall risk / shove effects.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Low mounds/roots partially block LoS

interactions.name: Soothe / Stake Out
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Monster Clue token (or scenario objective progress).

breakpoints.effect: Destroyed: remove den; place rubble/ash patch.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Broken spans partially block LoS; gaps do not

slots.label: Ruins Anchor
notes: Use for chase hazards or collapse triggers.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Broken stone walls partially block LoS

interactions.name: Study the Ruins
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Lore token or reveal a secret (scenario-defined).

visibility.blocks_los_when: Pyramid mass blocks LoS through its body

test.on_fail: Lose footing: remain at current level; take 1 die damage

interactions.name: Apex Rite
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Ritual point and 1 Lore token.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through statue mass

test.on_fail: Fall: take 2 dice damage; remain at base

interactions.name: Invoke the Effigy
interactions.on_success: Reveal/flip a Tzul effect (scenario-defined).

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through statue mass; counts as tall blocker

test.on_fail: Fall: take 3 dice damage; remain at base

interactions.name: Awaken the Colossus (Risky)
interactions.on_success: Trigger major Tzul event (scenario-defined).
interactions.on_fail: Catastrophic backlash: take 3 dice damage; create a 3" Tainted Ground zone.

slots.label: Monument Objective
notes: Place a faction banner / obelisk marker here.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Provides concealment: treat LoS through as partial

interactions.name: Harvest Samples
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Sample token (counts as Loot or Lore).

breakpoints.effect: Burned/cleared: remove concealment; becomes open ground.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

interactions.name: Dig Up Cache
interactions.on_success: Gain 2 Supply tokens (or 1 Loot + 1 Resource).

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight

slots.label: Unstable Anchor
notes: Use for cave-in, sink, detonation, storm effects.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Partially blocks LoS across the pile
Partially blocks LoS close to ground
Partially blocks LoS close to ground
Partially blocks LoS close to ground
Blocks LoS through walls

interactions.name: Search the Shed
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Supply token.

breakpoints.effect: Destroyed: replace with small rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through walls; doorways grant partial LoS

interactions.name: Search the Barn
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Supply token and 1 Food token.

breakpoints.effect: Roof damage: loft loses cover (Light -> None).
Collapse: loft becomes impassable rubble; models on loft take 2 dice damage.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Provides partial LoS through tall rows

slots.label: Field Anchor
notes: Good for stealth lanes and crop fires.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Never blocks line of sight
Blocks LoS through walls; windows grant partial LoS

interactions.name: Ransack House
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Loot token and 1 Food token.
interactions.on_fail: Noise: nearest enemy gains +1 die vs you next attack.

breakpoints.effect: Windows shattered: interior cover reduced (Light -> None in affected rooms).
Collapse: roof becomes impassable rubble; anyone on roof takes 2 dice damage.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through metal shell

interactions.name: Loot the Hut
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Mechanical Parts token and 1 Supply token.
interactions.on_fail: Locked down: take 1 die damage (shock/cut) and gain nothing.

breakpoints.effect: Shell breached: edges cover drops from Heavy to Light.
Caved in: replace with large rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through walls; windows/doors partial

interactions.name: Scavenge the Cantina
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Loot token. If you have a Social/Charm hook, gain +1 extra token (scenario-defined).

breakpoints.effect: Interior wrecked: interior cover becomes None.
Collapse: replace with large rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Broken walls partially block LoS

interactions.name: Search the Ruins
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Loot token.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through walls; stained windows are partial

interactions.name: Sanctify / Profane
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Faith token (or flip a Consecration state).

breakpoints.effect: Cracked stone: edges cover drops from Heavy to Light.
Collapse: replace with large rubble; models inside take 2 dice damage.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Broken walls partially block LoS

interactions.name: Search the Ruined Church
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Lore token.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through walls; many windows are partial

interactions.name: Search for Intel
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Intel token (counts as Loot).
interactions.on_fail: Compromised: nearest enemy gains +1 die vs you next attack.

breakpoints.effect: Interior wrecked: interior cover becomes None.
Collapse: replace with large rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Broken walls partially block LoS

interactions.name: Search the Ruins
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Loot token.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through walls; windows partial

interactions.name: Loot the Shop
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Supply token and 1 Loot token.

breakpoints.effect: Shelves smashed: interior cover becomes None.
Collapse: replace with large rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Broken walls partially block LoS

interactions.name: Search the Ruined Shop
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Supply token.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Blocks LoS through walls

interactions.name: Search the House
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Loot token.
interactions.on_fail: Noise: nearest enemy gains +1 die vs you next attack.

breakpoints.effect: Windows shattered: interior cover becomes None.
Collapse: replace with large rubble.

visibility.blocks_los_when: Broken walls and collapsed sections partially block LoS

interactions.name: Search the Ruins
interactions.on_success: Gain 1 Loot or Supply token (scenario choice).
interactions.on_fail: Disturb unstable debris; this unit suffers 1 die damage.

slots.label: Civilian Remains / Clue
notes: Scenario hook, narrative trigger, or investigation point.

breakpoints.effect: Further collapse: interior becomes hazardous terrain.
Total collapse: replace with rubble.

notes: Any units inside take 1 die damage when collapse occurs.
